org.interledger.codecs

クラス CodecContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.interledger.codecs.CodecContext

  • public class CodecContext
extends Object
    A contextual object for matching instances of Codec to specific class types.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      CodecContext()
      No-args Constructor.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      boolean hasRegisteredCodec(Class<?> clazz)
      Indicates if context has a registered Codec for the specified class.
      <T> T read(Class<T> type, byte[] data)
      Helper method that accepts a byte array and a type hint, and then decodes the input to the appropriate response payload.
      <T> T read(Class<T> type, InputStream inputStream)
      Helper method that accepts an InputStream and a type hint, and then decodes the input to the appropriate response payload.
      InterledgerPacket read(InputStream inputStream)
      Helper method that accepts an InputStream, detects the type of the packet to be read and decodes the packet to InterledgerPacket.
      InterledgerPacket read(InterledgerPacketType typeId, InputStream inputStream)
      Read an InterledgerPacket from the inputStream.

      Read an object from inputStream according to the rules defined in the context, handle any concrete logic inside of packetHandler, and return a result.

      Read an object from the buffer according to the rules defined in the CodecContext, and handle any terminating logic inside of packetHandler.

      Register a converter associated to the supplied type.

      Writes an instance of instance to an in-memory stream and returns the result as a byte array.

      Writes an instance of instance to the supplied OutputStream.

      Writes a generic instance of Object to an in-memory stream and returns the result as a byte array.

      Writes a generic instance of Object to the supplied OutputStream.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • CodecContext

        public CodecContext()
        No-args Constructor.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • register

        public <T> CodecContext register(Class<? extends T> type,
                                 Codec<T> converter)
        Register a converter associated to the supplied type.
        型パラメータ:
        T - An instance of T.
        パラメータ:
        type - An instance of {link Class} of type T.
        converter - An instance of Codec.
        戻り値:
        A CodecContext for the supplied type.

      • read

        public InterledgerPacket read(InterledgerPacketType typeId,
                              InputStream inputStream)
                       throws IOException
        Read an InterledgerPacket from the inputStream.
        パラメータ:
        typeId - An instance of InterledgerPacketType.
        inputStream - An instance of InputStream
        戻り値:
        An instance of InterledgerPacket as read from the input stream.
        例外:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong reading from the inputStream.

      • read

        public InterledgerPacket read(InputStream inputStream)
                       throws IOException
        Helper method that accepts an InputStream, detects the type of the packet to be read and decodes the packet to InterledgerPacket. Because InterledgerPacket is simply a marker interface, callers might prefer to utilize the functionality supplied by readAndHandle(InputStream, InterledgerPacket.Handler) or readAndHandle(InputStream, InterledgerPacket.VoidHandler).
        パラメータ:
        inputStream - An instance of InputStream that contains bytes in a certain encoding.
        戻り値:
        An instance of InterledgerPacket.
        例外:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong reading from the inputStream.

      • read

        public <T> T read(Class<T> type,
                  InputStream inputStream)
           throws IOException
        Helper method that accepts an InputStream and a type hint, and then decodes the input to the appropriate response payload.
        型パラメータ:
        T - The type of object to return, based upon the supplied type of type.
        パラメータ:
        type - An instance of Class that indicates the type that should be decoded.
        inputStream - An instance of InputStream that contains bytes in a certain encoding.
        戻り値:
        An instance of T.
        例外:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong reading from the buffer.

      • read

        public <T> T read(Class<T> type,
                  byte[] data)
        Helper method that accepts a byte array and a type hint, and then decodes the input to the appropriate response payload.

        NOTE: This methods wraps IOExceptions in RuntimeExceptions.

        型パラメータ:
        T - The type of object to return, based upon the supplied type of type.
        パラメータ:
        type - An instance of Class that indicates the type that should be decoded.
        data - An instance of byte array that contains bytes in a certain encoding.
        戻り値:
        An instance of T.

      • readAndHandle

        public void readAndHandle(InputStream inputStream,
                          InterledgerPacket.VoidHandler packetHandler)
                   throws IOException
        Read an object from the buffer according to the rules defined in the CodecContext, and handle any terminating logic inside of packetHandler.
        パラメータ:
        inputStream - An instance of InputStream to read data from.
        packetHandler - A InterledgerPacket.VoidHandler that allows callers to supply business logic to be applied against the packet, depending on what the runtime-version of the packet ultimately is.
        例外:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong while reading from the InputStream.

      • readAndHandle

        public <R> R readAndHandle(InputStream inputStream,
                           InterledgerPacket.Handler<R> packetHandler)
                    throws IOException
        Read an object from inputStream according to the rules defined in the context, handle any concrete logic inside of packetHandler, and return a result.
        型パラメータ:
        R - This describes the type parameter of the object to be read.
        パラメータ:
        inputStream - An instance of InputStream to read data from.
        packetHandler - A InterledgerPacket.Handler that allows callers to supply business logic to be applied against the packet, depending on what the runtime-version of the packet ultimately is, and then return a value.
        戻り値:
        An instance of R.
        例外:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong while reading from the InputStream.

      • write

        public <T> CodecContext write(Class<T> type,
                              T instance,
                              OutputStream outputStream)
                       throws IOException
        Writes an instance of instance to the supplied OutputStream.
        型パラメータ:
        T - The type of object to encode.
        パラメータ:
        type - An instance of Class that indicates the type that should be encoded.
        instance - An instance of T that will be encoded to the output stream.
        outputStream - An instance of OutputStream that will be written to.
        戻り値:
        An instance of CodecContext for further operations.
        例外:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong while writing to the OutputStream

      • write

        public CodecContext write(Object instance,
                          OutputStream outputStream)
                   throws IOException
        Writes a generic instance of Object to the supplied OutputStream.
        パラメータ:
        instance - An instance of Object that will be encoded to the output stream.
        outputStream - An instance of OutputStream that will be written to.
        戻り値:
        An instance of CodecContext for further operations.
        例外:
        IOException - If anything goes wrong while writing to the OutputStream

      • write

        public <T> byte[] write(Class<T> type,
                        T instance)
        Writes an instance of instance to an in-memory stream and returns the result as a byte array.

        NOTE: This methods wraps any IOExceptions in a RuntimeException.

        型パラメータ:
        T - The type of object to encode.
        パラメータ:
        type - An instance of Class that indicates the type that should be encoded.
        instance - An instance of T that will be encoded to the output stream.
        戻り値:
        The encoded object.

      • write

        public byte[] write(Object instance)
        Writes a generic instance of Object to an in-memory stream and returns the result as a byte array.

        NOTE: This methods wraps any IOExceptions in a RuntimeException.

        パラメータ:
        instance - An instance of Object that will be encoded to the output stream.
        戻り値:
        An instance of CodecContext for further operations.

      • hasRegisteredCodec

        public boolean hasRegisteredCodec(Class<?> clazz)
        Indicates if context has a registered Codec for the specified class.
        パラメータ:
        clazz - An instance of Class.
        戻り値:
        true if the supplied class has a registered codec, false otherwise.
